/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the typical urban landscape of Beijing. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene.
